s.text: Secretary of State Madeleine Albright when confronted on Face the Nation with the charge that the bombing had backfired.

"One of the unfortunate consequences of our bombing seems to have been to unleash a bloodbath, where the Serbs, military, paramilitary, are storming into Kosovo and driving people away," Tim Russert declared on Meet the Press . "Some are suggesting that the first phase of the air campaign has only intensified the alleged ethnic cleansing, the atrocities being committed in Kosovo," Wolf Blitzer added on Late Edition . On Face the Nation , Bob Schieffer suggested that NATO's bombing "has simply backfired."
Eventually, the consequences will become unbearable to one side or the other.
Eventually, the consequences will become unbearable to one side or the other.
